Title: Relating to prohibiting the sale or rental of illegally converted dwellings by real estate brokers
Summary: Prohibits the sale or rental of illegally converted dwellings by real estate brokers; directs increased fines and revocation of real estate license for violation.
LawCode: Add ยง443-b, amd ยง441-c, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to sale or rent of illegally converted dwellings
